channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 16 Best Heat Protectant Sprays for Wet and Dry Hair (2026)
item.description: I've spent almost a year testing dozens of heat protectants for hair. Whether you’re blow-drying, curling, or straightening, these are the best formul...

item.title: Sony A7V Review: The Best Overall Mirrorless Camera
item.description: Sony’s latest full frame mirrorless is a hybrid powerhouse with features to impress both video and still photographers.

item.title: Indonesia and Malaysia block Grok over non-consensual, sexualized deepfakes
item.description: Indonesian officials said Saturday that they are temporarily blocking access to xAI’s chatbot Grok.

item.title: Want to Stop Doomscrolling? You Might Need a Sleep Coach
item.description: Traditionally sleep coaches treat babies. But now more and more anxious, screen-attached grownups are the ones who need nursing.

item.title: Wing to expand drone delivery to another 150 Walmart stores
item.description: The partnership will grow Wing's drone delivery service to more than 270 Walmart stores by 2027.

item.title: Google announces a new protocol to facilitate commerce using AI agents
item.description: Google said that merchants can now offer discounts to users directly in AI mode results

item.title: Bluesound Pulse Cinema Review: A Pretty Sonos Alternative
item.description: This is a promising stand-alone Dolby Atmos soundbar for music fans, but it still needs a few software tweaks.

item.title: Best Side-Sleeper Mattresses 2026: Picked by a Sleep Science Coach
item.description: We’ve tested hundreds of the top hybrid, memory foam, and cooling mattresses to find the best combination of support and pressure relief.

item.title: OpenAI is reportedly asking contractors to upload real work from past jobs
item.description: An intellectual property lawyer says OpenAI is "putting itself at great risk" with this approach.

item.title: SpaceX gets FCC approval to launch 7,500 more Starlink satellites
item.description: The Federal Communications Commission has given SpaceX approval to launch another 7,500 of its second generation Starlink satellites.
